languages.text: Золотая статуя Императора, покрытая искаженными символами, украшена венком из слишком маленьких черепов.

traits.locale_text: Золотая статуя Императора, покрытая искаженными символами, украшена венком из слишком маленьких черепов.

languages.text: The golden statue of the Emperor is covered with twisted symbols and decorated with a garland of too-small skulls.
languages.original_text: Золотая статуя Императора, покрытая искаженными символами, украшена венком из слишком маленьких черепов.

traits.locale_text: The golden Emperor statue is covered with twisted symbols and is decorated with a garland of too-small skulls.

The golden statue of the Emperor is covered with twisted symbols and decorated with a garland of too-small skulls.

languages.text: 帝皇的金色雕像上刻满了扭曲的符号，还装饰着由许多小小的头骨组成的花环。
languages.original_text: The golden statue of the Emperor is covered with twisted symbols and decorated with a garland of too-small skulls.

traits.locale_text: 帝皇的金色雕像上刻满了扭曲的符号，还装饰着由许多小小的头骨组成的花环。

languages.text: La estatua dorada del Emperador está cubierta de símbolos retorcidos y decorada con una guirnalda de calaveras muy pequeñas.
languages.original_text: The golden statue of the Emperor is covered with twisted symbols and decorated with a garland of too-small skulls.

traits.locale_text: La estatua dorada del Emperador está cubierta de símbolos retorcidos y decorada con una guirnalda de calaveras muy pequeñas.

languages.text: 金色の皇帝像はいびつな記号で覆われているのみならず、極小の頭蓋骨を使った輪飾りで装飾されている。
languages.original_text: The golden statue of the Emperor is covered with twisted symbols and decorated with a garland of too-small skulls.

traits.locale_text: 金色の皇帝像はいびつな記号で覆われているのみならず、極小の頭蓋骨を使った輪飾りで装飾されている。

languages.text: La statue en or de l'Empereur est recouverte de symboles malveillants et ornée d'une guirlande de petits crânes petits.
languages.original_text: The golden statue of the Emperor is covered with twisted symbols and decorated with a garland of too-small skulls.

traits.locale_text: La statue en or de l'Empereur est recouverte de symboles malveillants et ornée d'une guirlande de petits crânes petits.

languages.text: Die goldene Statue des Imperators ist mit abstoßenden Symbolen bedeckt und mit einer Girlande aus zu kleinen Schädeln geschmückt.
languages.original_text: The golden statue of the Emperor is covered with twisted symbols and decorated with a garland of too-small skulls.

traits.locale_text: Die goldene Statue des Imperators ist mit abstoßenden Symbolen bedeckt und mit einer Girlande aus zu kleinen Schädeln geschmückt.

languages.text: İmparator'un altın heykeli, tuhaf sembollerle kaplanıp minik kafataslarıyla süslenmiş.
languages.original_text: The golden statue of the Emperor is covered with twisted symbols and decorated with a garland of too-small skulls.

traits.locale_text: İmparator'un altın heykeli tuhaf sembollerle kaplı ve minik kafataslarıyla süslenmiş.
